channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management

item.title: CVE-2016-8949|2024-09-16T16:18:53.494Z -- ibm -- emptoris%20supplier%20lifecycle%20management
item.description: IBM Emptoris Supplier Lifecycle Management 10.0.x and 10.1.x could allow a remote attacker to conduct phishing attacks, using an open redirect attack. By persuading a victim to visit a specially-crafted Web site, a remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to spoof the URL displayed to redirect a user to a malicious Web site that would appear to be trusted. This could allow the attacker to obtain highly sensitive information or conduct further attacks against the victim. IBM X-Force ID: 118836.
